sentences.en: All you have to do is right-click on the desktop and select New Folder.
sentences.cn: 你只要在桌面上点击鼠标右键，选择“新建文件夹”就行了。

sentences.en: CAD and desktop publishing continue to be improved with ever new and faster PCs.
sentences.cn: 电脑辅助设计和小规模出版业随着日新月异的个人电脑而改进.

sentences.en: Contains shortcuts that the Desktop Cleanup Wizard moved here.
sentences.cn: 包含“桌面清理向导”移动到此的快捷方式.

sentences.en: Desktop shortcuts save in the desktop folder, which complies with the 8.3 naming convention.
sentences.cn: 保存在desktop文件夹中的桌面快捷方式遵守8.3命名惯例.

sentences.en: Do you know which one is better, a laptop or a desktop?
sentences.cn: 你知道哪一种更好, 笔记本还是台式机?

sentences.en: Get freetree for your desktop. Decorate your desktop Christmas tree.
sentences.cn: 特别提醒,鼠标放到圣诞树上面有倒计时.

sentences.en: Kiosks thus tread an interesting middle ground between the two most common desktop postures.
sentences.cn: 这样看来很有意思,信息亭站在了两种最常见的桌面姿态的中间.

sentences.en: Many devices share information with desktop systems.
sentences.cn: 很多设备都会与桌面系统交换数据,所以我们可以这样考虑一下.

sentences.en: My computer is a desktop computer of excellent quality.
sentences.cn: 我的计算机是品质卓越的台式计算机.

sentences.en: The answer again goes back to the global metaphor of the desktop.
sentences.cn: 答案又要追溯到整体桌面隐喻.

sentences.en: The New 3 D Optical Desktop Scanner affordable for all!
sentences.cn: 新的三维光学扫描仪桌面就是要让所有人都买得起!

sentences.en: The systems are packaged in three basic models: desktop, deskside and rack - mount.
sentences.cn: 该系统有三种机型: 桌上型 、 桌边型和架上型.

sentences.en: Today all desktop and notebook hard disk drives implement the security features.
sentences.cn: 现在所有的桌面计算机和笔记本电脑硬盘都采用该安全功能.

sentences.en: Users can download their material to a desktop PC.
sentences.cn: 用户可以把资料下载到台式机上。

sentences.en: We have stopped making desktops because no one is making money from them.
sentences.cn: 我们已经停止生产台式电脑了，因为不赚钱。

sentences.en: When launched, the Macintosh was the smallest desktop computer ever produced.
sentences.cn: 当初上市的时候，麦金塔电脑是所有台式电脑里最小的。

phrases.tran_cn: 台式印刷系统；桌面出版系统

trans.tran_en: the main area on a computer where you can find the  icon s  that represent programs, and where you can do things to manage the information on the computer
